name: MADLAB (TeamKatana)
description:
The game is located in the near future. A powerful organization took a child from home in exchange for saving him from a safe death as he was very ill. They do experiments with a new metal of incredible properties that they have discovered. These experiments give him powers but he becomes crazy and escapes, the voice of his boss is the one who knows how to control his power because he does not want to remember what they have done.

Can you escape leave here?

language: Spanish

WASDProductions:

Artist: Binrong Zheng

Game Designer: Pau Blanes

Programmer: Adrià Biarnés
